steps.title: Upload Your Materials
steps.description: Drop your PDFs, documents, or notes into QuizBee. Our AI analyzes the content and prepares to create personalized quizzes based on your materials.

steps.title: Take Adaptive Quizzes
steps.description: Start your quiz and adjust difficulty on the fly. Refine topics, change complexity, and learn at your own pace. Each question is generated based on your actual study materials.

steps.title: Learn with AI Tutoring
steps.description: Stuck on a question? Start a conversation with your AI tutor. Get detailed explanations, explore related concepts, and truly understand the material - not just memorize answers.

steps.title: Grow Over Time
steps.description: QuizBee learns from your journey. As you progress, it identifies your weak spots and knowledge gaps, adapting future questions to focus on areas that need improvement. Build lasting mastery through continuous, personalized reinforcement.

questions.question: How is QuizBee different from Quizlet or other quiz apps?
questions.answer: Unlike traditional flashcard apps, QuizBee uses AI to generate questions directly from YOUR materials - not from pre-made decks. Plus, you get a personal AI tutor that can explain any concept from your materials in real-time. It's like having a study buddy who's read everything you have.

questions.question: What file formats do you support?
questions.answer: We support PDF, DOCX, TXT, and more. You can upload lecture notes, textbooks, study guides, articles - pretty much any text-based learning material. Our AI analyzes the content and generates relevant questions.

questions.question: How does the AI tutor work?
questions.answer: After each quiz question, you can start a conversation with our AI tutor. It has full context of your study materials and can explain concepts, provide examples, clarify confusing topics, and answer follow-up questions - all based on YOUR specific materials.

questions.question: Can I use QuizBee on my phone?
questions.answer: Yes! QuizBee works on any device with a web browser - desktop, tablet, or mobile. Study anywhere, anytime. Your progress syncs across all devices automatically.

questions.question: How does the adaptive difficulty work?
questions.answer: You can adjust difficulty mid-quiz if questions are too easy or too hard. Plus, QuizBee learns from your mistakes over time, focusing future quizzes on topics you struggle with. It's personalized learning that grows with you.

questions.question: Is my data secure and private?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Your study materials and quiz history are encrypted and private. We never share your data with third parties. You own your content and can delete it anytime.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes! No long-term contracts or commitments. Cancel with one click from your account settings. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period, and we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee.

questions.question: Do you offer student discounts?
questions.answer: Yes! Students with a valid .edu email address get 20% off Pro plans. Just sign up with your student email to automatically receive the discount.
